modName: Fabulous Followers - 5 Breton Girls - NO Other Mods Reqd - UNP UNPB CBBE and ADEC Options
summary: Adds 3 Breton mages to the game, as followers and marriable NPC's. They come with custom meshes, skin textures, eye, and hair - no other mod is required for their appearance, and they'll affect no other NPC's.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red]***********************************************************
I AM NOT ACTIVELY MODDING SKYRIM AT THE MOMENT.

Anything I created is free for use and derivitive work. None of mods were complete and I apologize that some of them were never finished. If someone wants to pick up where I left off, they are welcome to use my work by either uploading their own mod or I can give them access to that mod's page.

My custom work will continue as planned.

Thanks everyone for your support and hopefully I will come back soon. But alas, I have a seasonal job and until April 15th, I don't know how much time I will have, or when I do have time, if I'll want to return to skyrim modding.
*********************************************************** [/color]

Update 1.5 is up with major improvements - check the changelog :D

[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/HUi0M.png[/img][/center]

[b] Please note you should not need any other mods for the girls to look as the do in screenshots, and it will not conflict with any body/face mods you have in place. They should look exactly as they do in the screenshots, minus the armor, which you can find a link to at the bottom of this description![/b]

This mod introduces 5 NPC's, each with their own set of body meshes and textures, in order to give them a great look without having to go through the process of installing other mods. The NPCs are female bretons, and are designed to be followers, but you can also marry them.


[img]http://i.imgur.com/dpCsV.png[/img]

[size=3][b]All Girls:[/b][/size]
[list] [*]are marked Essential[*]are Marriable [*]Auto-Level with Player [*]can be found at The Frozen Hearth in Winterhold (3 on the main level, 2 in the cellar)[*]have different voices so travelling with all 5 is not confusing[/list]

[size=3][color=yellow] 10/16/2012 2pm EST: This section STILL needs to be updated, but I need to sleep! So maybe this evening! Until then, you can use your favorite follower mod to look at the new girls stats/perks. I recommend one of the following:[/color]

EFF: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12933
UFO: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037
AFT: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524
[/size]

[size=3][b]Claribelle:

[/b][/size][b]Min Level: [/b]15[b] Max Level:[/b] 80
[b]Health: [/b]242[b] Magicka: [/b]195[b] Stamina: [/b]148
[b]Class:[/b] Combat Sorcerer
[b]Best Skills: [/b]Sneak, Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction, Restoration
[b]Inventory:[/b] Steel Sword
[b]Spells:[/b] Firebolt, Heal Other, Flames, Frostbite, Fury, Ice Spike, Soul Trap, Sparks, Turn Undead, Steadfast Ward, Lightning Bolt, Magelight
[b]Perks:[/b] Light Foot, Soul Siphen, Soul Squeezer, Destruction (Novice and Apprentice, Augmented Frost, Flames, and Shock

[size=3][b]Diani Girard:
[/b][/size]
[b]Min Level: [/b]20[b] Max Level:[/b] 86
[b]Health: [/b]308[b] Magicka: [/b]245[b] Stamina: [/b]182
[b]Class:[/b] Combat Sorcerer
[b]Best Skills:[/b] One Handed, Heavy Armor, Destruction, Illusion, Restoration
Inventory: Steel Dagger
[b]Spells:[/b] Chain Lightning, Fast Healing, Invisibility, Lightning Bolt, Lesser Ward
Perks: Light Foot

[size=3][b]Tristyn Tatum:
[/b][/size]
[b]Min Level: [/b]15 [b]Max Level:[/b] 80
[b]Health: 290 [/b] [b] Magicka: 220 [/b] [b] Stamina: [/b] 150
[b]Class:[/b] Combat Witchblade
[b]Best Skills:[/b] One Handed, Block, Conjuration, Destruction, Illusion, Restoration
[b]Inventory: [/b]Hide Shield, Steel Mace
[b]Spells:[/b] Close Wounds, Fast Healing, Firebolt, Lightning Bolt, Stoneflesh, Turn Undead, Steadfast Ward, Conjure Flame Atronach, Soul Trap
[b]Perks:[/b] Magic Resistance, Mage Armor, Augmented Shock, Regeneration, Respite, Recovery, Destruction Novice, Apprentice, Adept

[img]http://i.imgur.com/KhsGL.png[/img]
[b]I highly reccomend using a mod manager, especially NMM, to install this mod. There will be updates, and it's a lot easier to uninstall if you have problems this way.[/b]

NMM Installation:
Go to the "Files" tab
Click "Download with Manager" button under the only file there.
After the mod is downloaded with NMM, activate it and load up your game. It shouldn't make too much difference where in your load order you put it.

Non-NMM Installation:
Go to the "Files" tab
Click "Download Manually" under the only file there
After the mod is downloaded, unzip the 'Data" folder in the archive to your Skyrim directory. There shouldn't be any overwritten files but it will ask you to merge folders. Click "yes"

[img]http://i.imgur.com/eH4Wl.png[/img]
NMM:
Deactivate and delete the mod in NMM. Simple!

Non NMM:
Deactivate "3BretonGirls.esp" in your skyrim data options
In "Data" under your skyrim directory, delete the following files and folders:
FFBretons.esp
meshes/actors/character/Haezl
meshes/actors/character/Petra
meshes/actors/character/ffbretonshared
meshes/actors/character/Claribelle
meshes/actors/character/Diani
meshes/actors/character/Tristyn
facegendata/facegeom/ffbretons.esp
textures/actors/character/Diani
textures/actors/character/Claribelle
textures/actors/character/Tristyn
textures/actors/character/Haezl
textures/actors/character/Petra
textures/actors/character/ffbretonshared
textures/actors/character/facegendata/facetint/Ffbretons.esp

[img]http://i.imgur.com/65ZxN.png[/img]

Also check under the "Permissions and Credits" button!

Girls of Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21038
Girls of Skyrim PATCH - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23337
DIMONZED UNP female body - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6709
Phygit's FemFeet - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3666
Enhanced Character Edit - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12951
Navetsea's CBBE/Thepal/UNP compatible skin pack - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6554
Fair Skin Complexion Sweaty Body UNP Version - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19666
envision Face - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7897
Pretty Face - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7887
UNP Delicate - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20530
The Eyes of Beauty & Face Texture here - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722
numenume femalebrows - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7625#content
[b]BIG THANKS TO[/b]Apachii SkyHair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168
Numenume hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22816
Fallout Hair - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11173
Xenius Scarface - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24600

Special Thanks: Bethesda, The Nexus site admins, Basskim and Grospolina

Tools Used: Creation Kit, NPC Editor, Photoshop, NifSkope, DXTBmp
Mods Used: Puppeteer, Pinup Poser, FNIS

[b]What the girls are wearing in the screenshots:[/b]
UNP Super Skimpy Armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9546
Vidala's Dress: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11548
Fiona Armor: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13082


[img]http://i.imgur.com/TcOyU.png[/img]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25327][img]http://i.imgur.com/d17U5.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24846][img]http://i.imgur.com/piz6e.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24619][img]http://i.imgur.com/hzmwO.png[/img][/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24495][img]http://i.imgur.com/q42EW.png[/img][/url]
author: Natilde

files.name: FF - 3 Breton Girls v1_3
files.changelogHtml:
Fixed Normal Maps & Specular head textures (Imperials already had this done)
User Requested: .esp and files renamed for consistency
User Requested: Separate Files for each girl added to \'Optional\' file section, more choice over who you bring in your game
User Requested: Non-Essential patch file added to \'Optional\' downloads section, making the girls able to die - This requires the main file be installed and does NOT work with the individual files.
Tristyn\'s Freckles improved

files.name: FF - Breton Girls v1_5
files.changelogHtml:
Two brand new girls - Petra and Haezl added to the Frozen Hearth Cellar
All girls\' appearances have been updated with higher resolution facetint maps, UNP regular body, fine-tuned haircolor, new custom facepaints and scars, and more!
All girls are now on a first name basis with you - no more long names.
Minor changes to skills and perks
Consolidated body mesh path for all girls, decreasing file size slightly (and then growing it huge again by adding 2 more followers!)
All girls are now on a first name basis with you - no more long names.
